name: noor
shortDescription: Noor is an islamic mobile app, consists of four main pages: home, favorite, alsabha, and settings. The data is structured in Cards that are easy to read, and has some actions that can be performed with the card content.
longDescription: Noor is an islamic mobile app, consists of four main pages: home, favorite, alsabha, and settings. The data is structured in Cards that are easy to read, and has some actions that can be performed with the card content.
